profile_summary: I'm a seasoned software professional with 16+ years of experience in automation, cloud solutions, and process optimization. My expertise lies in AI/ML, Cloud Computing, and Automation, with a passion for leveraging technology to drive business results. I excel in Python, Shell scripting, YAML, SQL, and JavaScript, and am actively exploring AI-driven automation and cloud cost optimization.
